allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: HDD Review Request Generator

React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS app that generates personalized
review request messages \(SMS, Email, Thank You Card\) for Hickory
Dickory Decks franchisees.

Features:
- Form with validation and localStorage persistence
- Three message templates with variable substitution
- Copy to clipboard with visual feedback
- SMS character count with segment warnings
- Mobile responsive design

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add HDD sentiment router landing page

Static sentiment routing page that intercepts customer feedback:
- Happy customers redirected to Google Reviews
- Unhappy customers directed to private feedback form
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Configurable for multiple franchise locations
- Supports Formspree, mailto, or Google Forms submission

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update docs to include sentiment router project

- README.md: Describe both projects with quick start guides
- CLAUDE.md: Architecture overview for both sentiment router and review generator

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Projects\\HDD" add .gitignore CLAUDE.md EXTERNAL_SERVICES_SETUP.md PROJECT_STATUS.md hdd-dashboard/config.js hdd-gbp-poster/SETUP_GUIDE.md hdd-gbp-poster/authenticate.js hdd-gbp-poster/list-accounts.js hdd-gbp-poster/post-update.js hdd-lead-response/package.json hdd-quote-calculator/calculator.js hdd-quote-calculator/config.js hdd-quote-calculator/index.html hdd-quote-calculator/styles.css hdd-review-generator/src/App.tsx hdd-review-generator/src/components/InputForm.tsx hdd-review-generator/src/components/OutputSection.tsx hdd-sentiment-router/feedback.html hdd-sentiment-router/index.html hdd-sentiment-router/styles.css hdd-sentiment-router/thank-you.html)

Bash(git -C "C:\\Projects\\HDD" add eslint.config.js index.html package-lock.json package.json postcss.config.js tsconfig.app.json tsconfig.json tsconfig.node.json vite.config.ts "public/vite.svg" "src/App.tsx" "src/assets/react.svg" "src/components/CopyButton.tsx" "src/components/Header.tsx" "src/components/InputForm.tsx" "src/components/MessageCard.tsx" "src/components/OutputSection.tsx" "src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts" "src/index.css" "src/main.tsx" "src/types/index.ts" "src/utils/generateMessages.ts")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Projects\\HDD" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Project cleanup: security fixes, UI improvements, docs updates

Security:
- Add credentials.json and token.json to .gitignore
- Expand .env coverage in gitignore

Cleanup:
- Remove duplicate root-level files \(src/, public/, config files\)
- These were copies of hdd-review-generator content

Dashboard:
- Fix 5 scaffolded tools showing "ready" instead of "needs-install"
- Fix lead-response port conflict \(3001 instead of 3000\)

Sentiment Router:
- Replace grey "HDD Logo" placeholder with "Hickory Dickory Decks" text

Review Generator:
- Add "New Customer" reset button to clear form for next customer

Quote Calculator:
- Add "Book Free Consultation" and "Call Us" CTA buttons
- Add contactPhone and bookingUrl to config

Documentation:
- Update PROJECT_STATUS.md with Photo Manager implementation status
- Update CLAUDE.md current status table
- Add OAuth Testing Mode warning to setup docs
- Fix "Honest Day 's Driving" references to "Hickory Dickory Decks"

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C C:/Projects/HDD add CLAUDE.md hdd-dashboard/config.js launcher.py)

Bash(git -C C:/Projects/HDD commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Improve launcher with resource safeguards and install all dependencies

- Add production mode \(P\) to launch only 4 essential tools
- Add warning confirmation before launching all 8 servers
- Add staggered startup with port-ready detection
- Add browser toggle \(B\) to start servers without opening tabs
- Install dependencies for all React/Vite projects
- Update dashboard config to show correct ready status
- Update CLAUDE.md with new launcher features and tool status

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(for dir in hdd-photo-manager hdd-referral-tracker hdd-warranty-tracker hdd-weather-content hdd-competitor-monitor)
